Plain text I would like tests performed on
this was a great test file, the best around. I remember writing this test file as if I was doing it right now
It wasn't always easy though, this test kind of sucked to write sometimes, felt bad when I thought about how
much money I might be spending on each of these requests. Money is important, isn't it? It gives us a new topic
to talk about, because we want to see results. Money is good.
